mapper.select: SELECT LCU.ID AS UNIT_ID, LCU.UNIT_NUMBER, LCU.SORT_NO AS U_NO, LCL.ID AS LAYER_ID, LCL.LAYER_NUMBER, LCL.SORT_NO AS L_NO, LCH.ID AS HOSEHOLD_ID, LCH.HOUSEHOLD_NUMBER, LCH.SORT_NO AS H_NO, LCHU.USER_ID, LCHU.ID AS HOUSEHOLD_USER_ID, LCHU.SORT_NO AS USER_NO FROM l_community_unit LCU LEFT JOIN l_community_layer LCL ON LCU.ID = LCL.UNIT_ID LEFT JOIN l_community_household LCH ON LCL.ID = LCH.LAYER_ID LEFT JOIN l_community_household_user LCHU ON LCH.ID = LCHU.HOUSEHOLD_ID WHERE ( (LCU.IS_ENABLE = 1 OR LCU.IS_ENABLE IS NULL )AND (LCU.IS_DELETE = 0 OR LCU.IS_DELETE IS NULL ) AND (LCL.IS_ENABLE = 1 OR LCL.IS_ENABLE IS NULL )AND (LCL.IS_DELETE = 0 OR LCL.IS_DELETE IS NULL ) AND (LCH.IS_ENABLE = 1 OR LCH.IS_ENABLE IS NULL )AND (LCH.IS_DELETE = 0 OR LCH.IS_DELETE IS NULL ) AND( LCHU.IS_DELETE = 0 OR LCHU.IS_DELETE IS NULL ) ) AND LCU.BUILDING_ID = #{buildingId}

select count(0) from l_community_unit lcu left join l_community_layer lcl on lcu.ID = lcl.UNIT_ID left join l_community_household lch on lcl.ID = lch.LAYER_ID inner join l_community_household_user lchu on lch.ID = lchu.HOUSEHOLD_ID where lcu.IS_DELETE = 0 and lcu.IS_ENABLE =1 and lcl.IS_DELETE = 0 and lcl.IS_ENABLE =1 and lch.IS_DELETE = 0 and lch.IS_ENABLE =1 and lchu.IS_DELETE = 0 and lchu.IS_ENABLE =1 and lcu.ID = #{unitId}
